summary: Extended Skyrim INI files with increased readability.
descriptionHtml:
[b]UPDATE:[/b] Have fixed the line breaks issue in notepad. Sorry, forgot about notepad users.

[i]These INI files are made purely to make experimenting with tweaks easier for beginners and give advanced users more overview.[/i]

[b]Techniques used:[/b]
- Whitespace
- Comments
- Categorization
- Commenting out variables with unsafe/unstable/unknown/etc values
- And probably more..

[b]A small example showing how it\'s organized:[/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35725-1-1367829236.png[/img]

This is a WIP but all standard variables are covered. Note that thou I have used default and \"very high\" as a reference any variables/values not in those files may have values assigned relative to my system by the game. I use Mod Organizer to run and manage all files so no values should be affected by my configurations (as MO keeps all INI files separated from vanilla game). I try to comment out any variables containing unknown default values.

If you find any variables with a value that is relative or in any ways not default post a comment I will correct it. As said for now I will use \"very high\" as a reference point.
author: KonTrax

files.name: SkyINI_REFERENCE_VERSION
files.changelogHtml: Fixed line breaks for notepad users
